night.text: Widely clear and dry in inland. More clouds with scattered showers on the coastal areas. Westerly wind 1-6 m/s, on coastal areas north, northwest wind 5-11 m/s. Air temperature in inland 0..+5, on the ground to -3, on the coast up to 12°C.
night.sea:
Sep 3, 2022 02:30 UTC
Forecast for Baltic Sea valid 24 hours from 07:00 UTC Sep 3 to 07:00 UTC Sep 4, 2022.
No warnings.
Weather summary: southwestern part of extensive Low.
Northern Baltic, Gulf of Finland, Moonsund, Northern Gulf of Riga: north, northwest 4-9, in gusts up to 12 m/s. Showers in many places. Visibility from moderate to good.
night.peipsi: West, northwest wind 3-8 m/s. Wave height 0.3-0.7 m. Possible showers. Visibility mainly good. Air temperature 8..10°C.

day.text: A few and variable cloud with showers in places. West, northwest wind 2-8, on coast in gusts up to 11 m/s. Air temperature 12..16°C.
day.peipsi: West, northwest wind 3-8 m/s. Wave height 0.3-0.7 m. Possible showers. Visibility mainly good. Air temperature 12..14°C.

night.text: Slightly cloudy, after midnight from north it is getting more cloudy with scattered showers locally. Northwest, north wind 2-7, on northern coast in gusts 12 m/s. Air temperature 2..7, on the ground around 0°C, on the coast up to 12°C.

day.text: Variable cloud. Locally showers with higher probability in Norteastern Estonia. In the evening clouds and showers turning away. Northwest, north wind 3-9, on coast in gusts 12 m/s. Air temperature 11..16°C.

night.text: Slightly or partly cloudv, on coast locally showers possible. Northerly 1-7 m/s. Air temperature 2..7, near the ground around 0°C,on coast to 12°C.

day.text: Cloud with bright spells. Locally some light rain. Northerly 2-7 m/s. Air temperature 11..16°C.

night.text: Slightly or partly cloudy. Locally fog. Weak variable wind. Air temperature 2..7, near the ground around 0°C,on coast to 12°C.

day.text: Variable cloudy. On islands showers. Weak variable wind, turning in afternoon westerly direction. Air temperature 12..17°C.
